What is Vocal Star?

It’s the first music talent agency of its kind — a multitalent agency dedicated to providing all the tools, exposure, connections, and actions necessary to succeed in the music industry.

What is Vocal Star?

It’s the first music talent agency of its kind — a multitalent agency dedicated to providing all the tools, exposure, connections, and actions necessary to succeed in the music industry.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/experience/” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-blue” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”full-screen” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/scrollingbanner.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” custom_padding=”100px||100px|” animation_style=”fade” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: center center;” box_shadow_style=”preset6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Get Access To The Best In The Business” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_2_text_color=”#877dc2″ background_layout=”dark”]

Get Access To The Best In The Business

From Multi-Platinum Grammy award winners to Internet Phenomenons, people that shape the music industry today, and the ones behind the scenes creating the stars — all the people who have the secrets you need to succeed will be at your disposal.

Jump-Start Your Craft

Singers, dancers, and performers of all ages learn from Pop Stars to Grammy award-winning producers how to make it in the music industry by training and preparing them for the future in their chosen career. Vocal Star provides you everything you need to successfully launch your career in the music industry today.

Jump-Start Your Craft

Vocal Star provides you everything you need to successfully launch your career in the music industry today.

At Vocal Star, our music talent agency will help you jump-start your craft. We will get you on the fast track in the music industry.
